DATA.description: Allows to read Action master data, aggregated elements (e.g. changes of status protocol) and used catalogs.
DATA.name: Actions: Read Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to write (create, copy, modify, delete) Action master data and aggregated elements.
DATA.name: Actions: Write Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to open the structure tree control of an Action to navigate to sub-actions and other related elements (e.g. related Defects).
DATA.name: Actions: Open Structure Tree

DATA.description: Allows to change the status of an Action.
DATA.name: Actions: Change of Status
